constructors.doc: Creates a new scrollbar with the given orientation.
constructors.name: new

doc:
The widget is a horizontal or vertical scrollbar, depending on the value of the property.

The position of the thumb in a scrollbar is controlled by the scroll adjustments. See for the fields in an adjustment - for , the field represents the position of the scrollbar, which must be between the field and - . The field represents the size of the visible scrollable area. The and fields are properties when the user asks to step down (using the small stepper arrows) or page down (using for example the Page Down key).
